metadata.title: Funny Coffee Then Rescue Stuff Shirt for Animal Rescues
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester
Perfect for anyone involved in animal rescue, from dog rescue to cat and wildlife rescue and horse rescue!
Express your passion for saving lives, no matter the species with this funny Rescue shirt!
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
description: Whether you spend your weekends transporting shelter dogs, rehabilitating wildlife, nurturing abandoned horses, or feeding feral cats, this funny shirt is perfect for anyone involved in saving lives through animal rescue! If you're proud of your hard work advocating for animals that may have been abused or neglected, wear this shirt with pride for your volunteer efforts. Non-profits, community organizers, and shelter volunteers play a huge part in the lives of the animals they love, and this funny and stylish shirt is perfect for wearing while you do your heart's work in Rescue!
metadata.store: Funny Dog Cat Horse Rescue Shirts
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "10 x 8 x 1 inches; 4.8 Ounces", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "September 1, 2015", "Manufacturer": "Funny Dog Cat Horse Rescue Shirts"}
